title: Twitter’s Musk says most-valuable employees can stay remote amid signs of revolt
description: The revision came as several Twitter employees said they were surprised by the large number of their colleagues who were opting to accept severance rather than sign a pledge to work harder.

title: ‘Goat Simulator 3’s’ gleeful gags and glitches generate guffaws
description: The innovations in this sequel elevate it above the one-note joke of the original "Goat Simulator."

title: In candid email, Blizzard head details suspension of game sales in China
description: Blizzard's president told employees the company's Chinese partner "was not aligned with our commitment to players, employees, and our operating principles."

title: The elitist philosophy that made Sam Bankman-Fried look like a good guy
description: Effective altruism, a mix of 18th-century utilitarianism and modern ideas about happiness, helped deflect scrutiny from Bankman-Fried's dubious crypto operation.

title: Tennessee AG probing Ticketmaster’s role in chaos over Taylor Swift tickets
description: Jonathan Skrmetti pledged to look at whether consumer or antitrust laws were violated by Ticketmaster after fans had glitches while trying to get Taylor Swift tickets.

title: After FTX meltdown, Congress starts to ask: Did it neglect crypto?
description: The stunning collapse of the world’s third-largest exchange has forced lawmakers to reckon with the costs of legislative inaction.

title: Internet providers play tricks to raise your bill. Here are the worst.
description: A new study of 22,000 American broadband bills by Consumer Reports shows how ISPs get you to pay more — and how you can fight back.

title: ‘Pokémon Scarlet,’ ‘Violet’ are good games with astonishing graphical issues
description: The two new Pokémon games have persistent technical problems and pacing issues. Still, both games mark a big step forward from "Sword" and "Shield."
